item.title: CVE-2024-1634|2024-06-18T02:37:12.621Z -- startbooking -- scheduling%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20online%20booking%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Scheduling Plugin â€“ Online Booking for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the 'cbsb_disconnect_settings' function in all versions up to, and including, 3.5.10. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to disconnect the plugin from the startbooking service and remove connection data.
